summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.6°C) and outside temperature (up 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.7 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1723 m), light levels (up 3458 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 137.4m lower than yesterday, 622.3m lower than the past week, 1723.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 929.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1551.9m and 2650m.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
